body: Seing his style i would have prefered he idd clothed sex, his character look very hcarming when clothed up.
Sanakan,  its just a opinion, not a complain. I know all about the redpill, MGTOW and more, so, easy, man. 😉

To the crybabies whining about NTR: If you can't handle women being slutty and sleeping around you should put women out of your mind entirely. It is what it is. Society has lost the power to rein in those particular animal instincts and most women certainly don't have the willpower or interest to do it themselves. The odds are very much stacked against you. A lot of women behave this way because they're programmed to fish around for the best partner.
This author has good art, but his stories taste are deplorable as always
